entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
